name: The Gramsby Summoning
description:
Originally made as an entry for Two-Minute-Horror Jam but finished way past the deadline.

Old Gramsby ProverbWhen a pale moon casts shadows after last light
and a feeling stirs: something's not quit right.
When a foul stench bears witness to deeds out of sight
then something is summoned in Gramsby tonight.

Controls:

[W] [S] - Open/Close Door
[RMB] - Zoom

Credits:

Art & Design by @leafthief
Music & Sound by Varhe Grigorijan
